Product.Long_Description: Olukai Mens Hiapo Sandals - Features: * Premium leather straps with whip stitched seam detail * Soft pig skin lining * Molded EVA midsole with exclusive OluKai Anatomical footbed shape for a supportive fit and long lasting cushioning * Premium full grain leather midsole skin with laser etched moko style footbed design * Toe grip feature for added comfort * Premium leather wrapped outsole construction * Non-Marking durable rubber outsole pods

Olukai Mens Ohana Sandals - Our Ohana sandals celebrate and support our Ohana Giveback Program. Water resistant synthetic leather straps, Soft, quick drying jersey knit lining and neoprene foam backer, Soft nylon toe post webbing, Non-slipping EVA Drop-In footbed, Anatomical, compression molded EVA midsole, Non-marking gum rubber outsole with gripping coral reef design, Laser-etched footbed logo and embroidery.

Olukai Mens 'Ohana Leather - Our 'Ohana sandals celebrate and support our 'Ohana Giveback Program. UPPER Water-resistant synthetic leather straps with soft, quick-drying jersey knit lining and neoprene backer. FOOTBED Anatomical compression-molded EVA midsole with EVA drop-in footbed for personalized fit. OUTSOLE Non-marking gum rubber outsole with coral reef lug design for added grip. FEATURES Soft nylon toe post webbing, laser-etched logo, and embroidered detail.

Olukai Mens Mea Ola Sandals - Featuring original octopus artwork, unique details and canoe lash stitching, the Mea Ola is a sandal like no other. UPPER Full grain antiqued leather straps with synthetic pigskin lining and neoprene backer. FOOTBED Compression-molded EVA midsole wrapped in premium full grain leather. Anatomically correct contour for a personalized fit and sustained comfort over time. OUTSOLE Full grain leather wrapped outsole with non-marking molded gum rubber traction pods. FEATURES Comfortable hand-sewn toe post, hand-sewn canoe lash whipstitch, metal rivets at toe post, octopus and Moko laser artwor on footbed, and embroidered logo detail.

OluKai Mens Hokua - UPPER Water-resistant synthetic leather strap with soft, quick-drying jersey knit lining and neoprene backer. FOOTBED Anatomical compression-molded EVA midsole with a brushed ICEVA drop-in footbed for personalized fit. OUTSOLE Non-marking gum rubber outsole, lugged and siped for enhanced grip. FEATURES Heavyweight deco stitching, soft nylon toe post webbing, laser etched footbed, and embroidered logo.

OluKai Mens Malolo - Closeout - UPPER Hydrophobic rubber straps bonded to fine knap synthetic lining suede. Laser perfed holes for maximum breathability. FOOTBED Compression-molded EVA midsole with anatomically correct contour for a personalized fit and sustained comfort over time. Brushed ICEVA drop-in footbed for personalized fit. OUTSOLE High-abrasion sticky-rubber and razor siping for improved traction on wet surfaces. FEATURES Stitchless bonded construction between lining and upper with laser perforated straps for maximum breathability.

OluKai Mens Manini - UPPER Premium smooth full-grain leather with detailed embroidered upper design. FOOTBED Compression-molded EVA midsole wrapped in premium full-grain leather. Anatomically correct contour for a personalized fit and sustained comfort over time. OUTSOLE Full-grain leather wrapped outsole with non-marking molded rubber traction pods. FEATURES Hand-sewn toe post, detailed embroidery work, sting-ray inspired laser-etched artwork.

OluKai Mens Punono - DETAILSFeaturing Paniolo-inspired footbed artwork, premium upper leather, and a hand stained leather outsole, the Punono is a one of a kind.UPPERPremium smooth full-grain leather straps with hand stitched toe post and detail strap stitching.Soft microfiber lining with a neoprene backer.FOOTBEDCompression-molded EVA midsole wrapped in a soft, full-grain leather. Anatomically correct contour for a personalized fit and sustained comfort over time.OUTSOLEHand stained hard leather outsole base, injected rubber pods with texture inspired by a native tapa pounder.FEATURESFootbed detailed with intricate Paniolo-inspired laser artwork.OUTBOARD STRAPSupports a larger, wider arch and toe area giving more stability and island style.

OluKai Mens Polani - DETAILS With its intricate hand stitched upper details and unique leather outsole, the Polani is old world meets contemporary design. UPPER Distinctive full-grain leather straps with intricate lashing stitch and perforation detail. Soft microfiber lining with neoprene backer. FOOTBED Compression-molded EVA midsole wrapped in a soft, full-grain leather. Anatomically correct contour for a personalized fit and sustained comfort over time. OUTSOLE Hand stained hard leather outsole base, injected rubber pods with texture inspired by a native tapa pounder. FEATURES Footbed featuring microstitch detail, hand-sewn toe post and embroidered logo.

Reef Mens Fanning - Sale - Comfortable, Water Fiendly Synthetic Nubuck Upper, Synthetic Full Grain Upper, Contoured Compression Molded EVA Footbed With Anatomical Arch Support, Full 360 Degree Heel Airbag Enclosed in Soft Polyurethan, Church Key To Open Your "Soda" Bottle, Reef Icon Herringbone Rubber Outsole.

Reef Leather Smoothy - Sale - The flip flop that became a classic is now made in five different styles. Reef Smoothy Sandals are comfy & lightweight. The new leather smoothy is available now. Click the buy button here for purchasing information.

Reef Mens J-Bay - Reef J-BAY is a lite 'low impact to the environment' full grain leather upper and footbed cover. Super soft glove-like pig skin lining. Reef metal logos. Deep contoured 51% recycled EVA midsole. Reef olas design outsole made of 25% recycled rubber.

Reef Mens Playa Negra - Sale - REEF PLAYA NEGRA water based/water friendly sythetic leather upper with asymmetrical comfort. Super soft textile lining. Heavy texture thermosliced footbed. Deep contoured compression molded EVA midsole. Reef olas design outsole made of 25% recycled rubber.

Reef Mens Leather Fanning - Sale - Nubuck or full grain leather upper. Soft glove leather lining. Contoured compression molded EVA footbed with anatomical arch support. Full 360 degree heel airbag enclosed in soft polyurethane. Rubber outsole. Leather version.

Reef Mens Draftsmen - The Reef Draftsmen is a guy's sandal from top to bottom. On top you have a masculine and durable sandal for men and on the bottom is a patented Reef bottle opener. With the built-in thirst quenching technology you will always be ready for the party. The natural leather tones complement pants in any color or fabric and are available in two colorways.
